samastha lokaye ma janathawa wetha budu himige mahangu dharmaya wyaptha kirima sandaha nawina janamadhya upayogi karagatha yuthu ya.nirmala buddha dharmaya athi shri lankawa bududahama lowa pura prachalitha kirime nayakathwaya gatha yuthu ya.”aththatama loka prajawata ape raten diya haki lokuma saha ekama ma hangi parithyagaya bududahamayi.me nirmala budu dahama mulu lowatama dharmanuku®lawa diya haki ekama ratath shri lankawayi.danata dweshaya, mohaya, yuda bhithiya ha wenath dukkhadayaka karunuwalin piri, andhakarayaka gilunu lo wasiyanta buddha dharmaye aalokaya mangin maithriya, karunawa ha samaya lowa pura wihiduwa siyalu minis wargayage hitha suwa pinisa mulu lowatama shanthiya pathirawima ape mukhya paramarthayayi.
